Class DrawText

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.Filter
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.videofilters.VideoFilter
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.videofilters.drawtext.DrawText
public class DrawText extends VideoFilter
This class implements the "drawtext" filter.

  • Method Details

    • setBox

      public void setBox(int box) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Enables or disables the box around the drawn text.
      Parameters:
      box - Enables the box if set to 1, disables it if set to 0.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given parameter is set to a value that is not 0 nor 1

    • setBoxBorderW

      public void setBoxBorderW(BoxBorderW boxborderw)
      Sets the "boxborderw" option.
      Parameters:
      boxborderw - The given BoxBorderW instance.

    • setBoxColor

      public void setBoxColor(@NotNull @NotNull String boxcolor) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the "boxcolor" option's value.
      Parameters:
      boxcolor - The new "boxcolor" option's value. This value must be compatible with the syntax required by FFmpeg.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given value is null or an empty string
      See Also:
      • https://ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg-utils.html#color-syntax for the list of accepted values

    • setLineSpacing

      public void setLineSpacing(double line_spacing) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the "line_spacing" option's value.
      Parameters:
      line_spacing - The new value of the "line_spacing" option. This value cannot be less than 0.0.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the "line_spacing" option's value is less than 0.0

      public void setYAlign(@NotNull @NotNull String y_align) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the "y_align" option's value.
      Parameters:
      y_align - The new "y_align" option's value. This value must be equal to "text", "baseline" or "font".
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given "y_align" option's value is different from "text", "baseline" or "font"
